title: Fewer see e-cigarettes as less harmful than cigarettes

title_detail.value: Fewer see e-cigarettes as less harmful than cigarettes

summary: The perception that e-cigarettes are less harmful than regular cigarettes fell between 2012 and 2014, a sign that fewer people see them as a safe alternative to smoking tobacco, a new study suggests.

summary_detail.value: The perception that e-cigarettes are less harmful than regular cigarettes fell between 2012 and 2014, a sign that fewer people see them as a safe alternative to smoking tobacco, a new study suggests.
